article_node.title: Trump tariffs live updates: White House advisor Navarro expects 50% India tariff
article_node.summary: White House trade advisor Peter Navarro criticized India for its continued purchase of Russian oil and announced that punitive tariffs on Indian imports are expected to take effect next week. Meanwhile, a Chinese official expressed support for India against the U.S. tariffs, highlighting a growing cooperation between the two nations. The U.S. and EU have also established a trade deal framework that includes a 15% tariff on most EU imports, while U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent anticipates significant revenue from these tariffs to help reduce federal debt.
